markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

Great day. I got so much done I need to put this in bullets:

  • Finally did some workout after weeks
  • Released my latest open source project node-reminders
  • Reached +100 newsletter subscribers
  • Wrote my first newsletter (will be sent next monday)
  • Helped someone reviewing its resume
  • Call with brotha

Making the most out of these days. Loving it so far.

Data Report

Highlights

  • Avoid news: Yes
  • Write blog: Yes
  • Personal growth: Yes
  • Wake up 5:00 am: Yes
  • Workout: Yes
  • Help someone: Yes
  • Time wasted < 90 mins: No

Finances

  • Spent: 15 USD
  • Stocks Portfolio (24h): +0.38%
  • Stocks Portfolio (All time): +11.97%
  • Cryptofolio (24h): -1.74%
  • Cryptofolio (All time): +60.02%

Stay tuned.

frontmatter.title: Quarantine — Day 29
frontmatter.description: Finally exercised. Milestone achived. +100 newsletter subscribers.
